template.template: Raid LSI MegaRaid All Adapters and Enclosures
template.name: Raid LSI MegaRaid All Adapters and Enclosures
template.description:
- install pciutils and check if server has supported MegaRAID controller lspci | grep MegaRAID - install sudo and configure it to include configuration files from /etc/sudoers.d - configure zabbix agent to include configuration files from /etc/zabbix/zabbix_agentd.d
- install MegaCli package
- for systems with "MegaRAID SAS 1078" disable "VirtualDrive Bad Blocks Exist" checks this controller does not provide required information which leads to false positive alerts VirtualDrive monitoring is limited to "VirtualDrive State" check

trigger_prototype.expression: {Raid LSI MegaRaid All Adapters and Enclosures:pd.smart["{#ADENCSLOT}"].str(No)}=0 and {Raid LSI MegaRaid All Adapters and Enclosures:pd.state["{#ADENCSLOT}"].str(Failed)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: LSIMegaRaid: {#ADENCSLOT} has flagged a S.M.A.R.T alert

trigger_prototype.expression: {Raid LSI MegaRaid All Adapters and Enclosures:pd.mediaerror["{#ADENCSLOT}"].last(0)}>0 and {Raid LSI MegaRaid All Adapters and Enclosures:pd.state["{#ADENCSLOT}"].str(Failed)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: LSIMegaRaid: {#ADENCSLOT} Media Error Count

trigger_prototype.expression: {Raid LSI MegaRaid All Adapters and Enclosures:pd.othererror["{#ADENCSLOT}"].last(0)}>0 and {Raid LSI MegaRaid All Adapters and Enclosures:pd.state["{#ADENCSLOT}"].str(Failed)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: LSIMegaRaid: {#ADENCSLOT} Other Error Count

trigger_prototype.expression: {Raid LSI MegaRaid All Adapters and Enclosures:pd.failurecount["{#ADENCSLOT}"].last(0)}>0 and {Raid LSI MegaRaid All Adapters and Enclosures:pd.state["{#ADENCSLOT}"].str(Failed)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: LSIMegaRaid: {#ADENCSLOT} Predictive Failure Count

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Raid LSI MegaRaid All Adapters and Enclosures:pd.state["{#ADENCSLOT}"].str(Online)}=0) + ({Raid LSI MegaRaid All Adapters and Enclosures:pd.state["{#ADENCSLOT}"].str(good)}=0) + ({Raid LSI MegaRaid All Adapters and Enclosures:pd.state["{#ADENCSLOT}"].str(JBOD)}=0) >2
trigger_prototype.name: LSIMegaRaid: {#ADENCSLOT} state is not online
